discrepancies.finding: Bill of Lading does not contain an express statement that one or more other bills of lading related to the referenced container or packing unit must be surrendered prior to the goods being released.
Bill of Lading does not indicate the name, address, and contact details of a delivery agent or words of similar effect at or for the port of discharge.
Bill of Lading does not contain authentication of corrections made on the document.
Bill of Lading does not contain a statement indicating the payment of freight identical to that stated in the credit.

compliances.finding: Bill of Lading is titled as 'Ocean Bill of Lading' which is acceptable.
Bill of Lading contains a dated on-board notation which is deemed to be the date of shipment.
Bill of Lading indicates the place of receipt and port of loading, and there is no indication of a means of pre-carriage.
